content.prompt: In sticklebacks, which of the following is most likely to occur if the jaw enhancer is disabled instead of the hindlimb enhancer?

choices.label: The jaw and a pronounced pelvic spine develop normally because the Pitx1 gene is expressed in both developing tissues.
Neither the jaw nor a pronounced pelvic spine develop normally because there is no Pitx1 gene expression in either developing tissue.
The jaw develops normally, but a pronounced pelvic spine does not develop because the Pitx1 gene is expressed in the developing jaw but not in the developing pelvis.
The jaw does not develop normally, but a pronounced pelvic spine does develop because the Pitx1 gene is expressed in the developing pelvis but not in the developing jaw.

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
